item.title: First Time Clipper Self Haircut
item.description: [Dated 12/12/2010; Posted 5/2/2011 due to photos.] If you think this is a “own haircut how to”, let me tell you, you’ll be disappointed because it is not. However, you can read further to find out my tale with giving myself a haircut for the first time. When I was kid, I had this dream, albeit shot-lived, of becoming an hairstylist. But then I went to college trying to become an engineer!
